borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
site_name: Fulham Gas WorksImperial RoadLondon
description: Non-Material Amendment to Reserved Matters Application (Ref: 2021/02533/RES) dated 14th March 2022, for the 'Reserved Matters Application relating to the approval of access; appearance; landscaping; layout and scale in respect of Phases 2c and 2d (Development Plots D1 and D2), for the erection of two mixed-use buildings, comprising commercial and residential floorspace with associated landscaping and play space, in compliance with Condition 1 (Reserved Matters Details) and Condition 5 (Design Codes, Development Specification and Parameter Plans) of planning permission (ref: 2018/02100/COMB) granted 8 February 2019 (a comprehensive residential led mixed use redevelopment of the former Gasworks Site).'Amendments to allow; reduced building heights; updated D1 ground floor levels to Imperial Road; the addition of 2 external columns to D2 ground floor; changes to refuse provision; updates to ground floor ancillary spaces and cycle storage provision; amendments to ground floor curtain wall glazing; changes to architectural metalwork including privacy screens, ground floor louvered doors, and partial terrace balustrades; changes to window and door opening directions; amendment of brick colour to some recessed balconies; changes to architectural metalwork and window colour; and updates to the extents of green roofing and plant screening.
